Title: AKA Top Shelf Perverts
Writer: Brian Michael Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Jenna Reback, Micah Schraft, Jenna Reback (staff writer)
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Rachael Taylor, Wil Traval, Eka Darville
Plot: Malcom, Simpson and Trish go rogue to prevent Jessica from carrying out an extreme plan to outwit Kilgrave.
